name: Heoro Tail
description: A Kaithe with the Heoro Tail evokes glory.

languages.description: Ein Kaithe mit dem Heoro-Schweif beschwört Ruhm herauf.
languages.name: Schweif: Heoro

languages.description: Un Kaithe avec la Queue Heoro évoque la gloire.
languages.name: Queue Heoro

languages.description: Un Kaithe con la Coda Heoro evoca la gloria.
languages.name: Coda Heoro

languages.description: 헤오로 꼬리를 지닌 케이스는 영광을 불러일으킵니다.
languages.name: 헤오로 꼬리

languages.description: Un kaithe con cola Heoro evoca la gloria.
languages.name: Cola Heoro

languages.description: 拥有荣英马尾的绝灵骥召唤出荣耀。
languages.name: 荣英马尾

languages.description: Heoroテールを持つケイスは栄光をもたらす。
languages.name: Heoro テール

languages.description: Kaithe z Ogonem Heoro przywołuje chwałę.
languages.name: Ogon: Heoro

languages.description: Um Kaithe com a Cauda Heoro encoraja à glória.
languages.name: Cauda Heoro

languages.description: 赫耀馬尾的凱駿喚起榮耀。
languages.name: 赫耀馬尾

languages.description: Kaithe ที่ติดหาง Heoro นั้นจะนำมาซึ่งความรุ่งโรจน์
languages.name: หาง Heoro

languages.description: Heoro Kuyruğuna sahip bir Kaithe, ihtişamı çağrıştırır.
languages.name: Heoro Kuyruğu
